acercaDeNosotros: About us: Mission, Vision, Values, History
mensajeDefaultBanner: At Clínica de la Costa, we know how important it is to feel supported during your most challenging moments. Our team is committed to providing you with warm, human, and personalized care, ensuring that you feel safe and confident in a trusted environment.
descripcionAtencionPersonalizada: We care about your well-being. Our specialists are here to listen, understand, and provide the care you truly need, always with warmth and empathy.
descripcionUrgenciasDisponibles: We know emergencies don't wait. We're here for you day and night to ensure you receive the care you need when you need it most.
descripcionCuidadoConTecnologia: Your health deserves the best. We use state-of-the-art technology to offer you precise diagnoses and treatments, always focused on your well-being.
descripcionAtencionFamilia: We care about every member of your family. We offer comprehensive care that promotes the health and well-being of everyone, from the little ones to the elders.
comprometidosConTuSalud: Committed to Your Health and Well-being
clinicaFamilia: At Clínica de la Costa, we care for you as if you were part of our family.
descripcionSobreNosotros: We focus on providing you with human and friendly care, supported by advanced technology and a team of professionals dedicated to your health. From specialized medical services to emergency care, we are here to accompany you every step of the way.
oxigenoADomicilio: Home delivery of oxygen for your convenience
medicosDeGuardia: On-call doctors always ready to assist you
emergenciasMedicas: 24/7 Medical Emergencies because your well-being is our priority
equipoMedico: Medical team at Clínica de la Costa
tuSaludEsNuestraMayorPrioridad:
Your Health is Our
Top Priority
descripcionPersonalMedicoComprometido: Our team consists of dedicated doctors and specialists passionate about caring for you, providing a friendly and human approach to make you feel confident.
descripcionAtencionEmergencias24: We know that emergencies don't wait. We are available 24/7, always ready to help you when you need it most.
descripcionCitasMedicasEnLinea: We want accessing our care to be as comfortable as possible for you. Schedule your appointments easily from the comfort of your home.
descripcionAtencionContinuada: We are here for you whenever you need us. Our services are available 24/7, because your well-being is our priority.
descripcionTestimonios: Our patients are our top priority. Discover their experiences and how we have helped improve their quality of life.
facilYRapidoComoTeAtendemos: Fast & Easy: How We Care for You
descripcionProceso: At Clínica de la Costa, we make your care simple and efficient. Discover our process designed to provide you with the best support in a fast and easy way.
descripcionAgendarUnaCita: Scheduling your appointment is quick and easy. Contact us via our website, phone call, or visit us in person.
descripcionAsisteATuCita: Receive care from our specialists in a comfortable and safe environment, where all your questions are answered with empathy and professionalism.
descripcionSeguimientoContinuo: We ensure that you receive continuous follow-up to maintain and improve your health, supporting you every step of the way.
descripcionNeurocirugia: We care about your brain health with a team of highly qualified neurosurgeons, always ready to provide you with the best possible care.
descripcionLaboratorioModerno: We understand the importance of an accurate diagnosis. Our laboratory is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to provide you with fast and reliable results.
descripcionMedicosExperimentados: Our doctors are here to listen, care, and accompany you, offering a warm and human approach to ensure your well-being.

textContent.title: MSD
textContent.description: Recognition to the CIC for excellent performance and quality management in the execution of clinical studies. April 2017.

textContent.title: MSD
textContent.description: Recognition to the CIC for its contribution to the development of clinical research during the 75th anniversary celebration.

textContent.title: November 2022
textContent.description: MSD - Inventing for Life - Presents this recognition to Clínica de La Costa for its contribution to science and innovation in clinical research in Colombia.

textContentRight.title: May 2021
textContentRight.description: MSD - Presents this recognition to Clínica de la Costa for its adaptability and efficiency in administrative and regulatory processes during the pandemic. Bogotá, Colombia.

textContentRight.title: May 9, 2024
textContentRight.description: MSD - Excellent quality metrics during 2023 and Q1 2024. Proudly presented to Clínica de la Costa. This certificate is awarded for honorable achievement.

textContentRight.title: May 2021
textContentRight.description: MSD - Presents this recognition to Clínica de la Costa for the extraordinary efforts made to ensure safety and continuity in patient studies during the pandemic. Bogotá, Colombia.

barranquilla.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to know more about the available consultations at Clínica de la Costa in Barranquilla.
barranquilla.mensaje: At Clínica de la Costa Barranquilla, we understand that during the most important moments of your health, you need a team that supports you with warmth and humanity. Our commitment is to provide personalized care, ensuring you feel safe and confident every step of your recovery.

cartagena.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to know more about the available consultations at Clínica de la Costa in Cartagena.
cartagena.mensaje: At Clínica de la Costa Cartagena, we understand that taking care of your health means more than just treatment. Our team is dedicated to providing warm and close care, creating a safe and trustworthy environment so that you always feel supported and in good hands.

santaMarta.nombre: Clínica de la Costa - Santa Marta
santaMarta.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to know more about the available consultations at Clínica de la Costa in Santa Marta.
santaMarta.mensaje: At Clínica de la Costa Santa Marta, we are committed to providing you with comprehensive care focused on your needs. Our medical team offers personalized and human service, ensuring you feel safe and well-cared for during your treatment.

rioacha.direccion: Calle 51 N 4/15 kL 2 salida valle dupar
rioacha.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to know more about the available consultations at Clínica de la Costa in Riohacha.
rioacha.mensaje: At Clínica de la Costa Riohacha, we work to make your medical experience exceptional. Our highly qualified team will provide you with close and personalized care, ensuring you feel supported in a reliable and safe environment.
